data.actual_result: The invite screen of the server you just joined pops up again. If you had your keyboard open when tapping the server, the keyboard will stay open in the invite screen
data.expected_result: Should jump to the server and that's it. If you do it without following the previous steps your Discord will crash but that's not the subject of the report
data.short_description: Accessing Join a server screen via Quick Switcher and trying to jump to a server after you accepted it will reopen the invite sceen
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Quick Switcher - Write a query that shows no results - Tap Join a server button - Input a valid invite and join the server - Reopen Quick Switcher - Try to jump to a server
